languages.text: "Ты и сама знаешь". {n}Октавиана машет в сторону неприглядной двери, прикрытой листом металла.{/n} "Канализация — самое подходящее местечко для этой крысы. Знаешь, а он ведь всех нас Чорде сдать собирался, даже Владайма. Видела бы ты лицо Фалько, когда Владайм первый его псам Инквизитора слил, а-ха-ха!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты и сама знаешь". {n}Октавиана машет в сторону неприглядной двери, прикрытой листом металла.{/n} "Канализация — самое подходящее местечко для этой крысы. Знаешь, а он ведь всех нас Чорде сдать собирался, даже Владайма. Видела бы ты лицо Фалько, когда Владайм первый его псам Инквизитора слил, а-ха-ха!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "You know very well where." {n}Octaviana waves toward a drab-looking door covered by a sheet of metal.{/n} "The sewers are where that rat belongs. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "Ты и сама знаешь". {n}Октавиана машет в сторону неприглядной двери, прикрытой листом металла.{/n} "Канализация — самое подходящее местечко для этой крысы. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “你很清楚他在什么地方。”{n}奥克塔维娜朝一扇被金属板遮住的旧门挥了挥手。{/n}“那只臭老鼠只适合在下水道里呆着。你很清楚，他之前打算把我们所有人都出卖给库尔达。他打算连弗拉迪姆也一起卖了，可弗拉迪姆带着审判庭的狗，抢先找到了他。你真应该看看他当时那表情！哈哈！”
languages.original_text: "You know very well where." {n}Octaviana waves toward a drab-looking door covered by a sheet of metal.{/n} "The sewers are where that rat belongs. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: “你很清楚他在什么地方。”{n}奥克塔维娜朝一扇被金属板遮住的旧门挥了挥手。{/n}“那只臭老鼠只适合在下水道里呆着。你很清楚，他之前打算把我们所有人都出卖给库尔达。他打算连弗拉迪姆也一起卖了，可弗拉迪姆带着审判庭的狗，抢先找到了他。你真应该看看他当时那表情！哈哈！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「お詳しいんですね」{n}オクタヴィアナは金属板で覆われた殺風景なドアに向かって手を振った。{/n}「下水路はネズミの居場所です。あいつはチョーダに、ヴラダイム含む私達全員を売るつもりだったんです。ヴラダイムが異端審問官の犬を連れてやって来た時のファルコの顔ときたら！今でも笑えますよ！」
languages.original_text: "You know very well where." {n}Octaviana waves toward a drab-looking door covered by a sheet of metal.{/n} "The sewers are where that rat belongs. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: 「お詳しいんですね」{n}オクタヴィアナは金属板で覆われた殺風景なドアに向かって手を振った。{/n}「下水路はネズミの居場所です。あいつはチョーダに、ヴラダイム含む私達全員を売るつもりだったんです。ヴラダイムが異端審問官の犬を連れてやって来た時のファルコの顔ときたら！今でも笑えますよ！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Sabe muy bien dónde». {n}Octaviana hace un gesto con la mano hacia una puerta de aspecto apagado cubierta con una chapa de metal.{/n} «Esa rata debe estar en las cloacas. Iba a delatarnos a todos ante Chorda, incluido Vladaym. ¡Tendría que haber visto la cara de Falco cuando Vladaym llevó a los perros del Inquisidor hasta él primero, ja, ja!».
languages.original_text: "You know very well where." {n}Octaviana waves toward a drab-looking door covered by a sheet of metal.{/n} "The sewers are where that rat belongs. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: «Sabe muy bien dónde». {n}Octaviana hace un gesto con la mano hacia una puerta de aspecto apagado cubierta con una chapa de metal.{/n} «Esa rata debe estar en las cloacas. Iba a delatarnos a todos ante Chorda, incluido Vladaym. ¡Tendría que haber visto la cara de Falco cuando Vladaym llevó a los perros del Inquisidor hasta él primero, ja, ja!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Das wisst Ihr ganz genau." {n}Octaviana deutet auf eine schmutzige Tür, die mit einer Metallplatte bedeckt ist.{/n} "Diese Ratte gehört in die Kanalisation. Wisst Ihr, er wollte uns alle an Chorda verpfeifen. Auch Vladaym. Ihr hättet Falcos Gesicht sehen sollen, als Vladaym die Hunde des Inquisitors zuerst zu ihm geführt hat, ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "You know very well where." {n}Octaviana waves toward a drab-looking door covered by a sheet of metal.{/n} "The sewers are where that rat belongs. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: "Das wisst Ihr ganz genau." {n}Octaviana deutet auf eine schmutzige Tür, die mit einer Metallplatte bedeckt ist.{/n} "Diese Ratte gehört in die Kanalisation. Wisst Ihr, er wollte uns alle an Chorda verpfeifen. Auch Vladaym. Ihr hättet Falcos Gesicht sehen sollen, als Vladaym die Hunde des Inquisitors zuerst zu ihm geführt hat, ha ha!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Tu le sais très bien, » {n}répond Octaviana en montrant la porte délabrée recouverte d'une plaque de métal.{/n} « Les rats, ça vit dans les égouts. Tu savais qu'il était sur le point de tous nous balancer à Chorda ? Même Vladaym. Tu aurais dû voir la tête de Falco quand Vladaym a conduit les chiens de l'inquisiteur à lui en premier, ha ha ! »
languages.original_text: "You know very well where." {n}Octaviana waves toward a drab-looking door covered by a sheet of metal.{/n} "The sewers are where that rat belongs. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: « Tu le sais très bien, » {n}répond Octaviana en montrant la porte délabrée recouverte d'une plaque de métal.{/n} « Les rats, ça vit dans les égouts. Tu savais qu'il était sur le point de tous nous balancer à Chorda ? Même Vladaym. Tu aurais dû voir la tête de Falco quand Vladaym a conduit les chiens de l'inquisiteur à lui en premier, ha ha ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Nerede olduğunu pekâlâ biliyorsun." {n}Octaviana; sac levhayla önü kapatılmış, sönük renkli kapıyı işaret ediyor.{/n} "O sıçanın yuvası lağımdır. Hepimizi Chorda'ya ispiyonlayacaktı, biliyor musun? Vladaym'ı bile. Vladaym evvela Engizisyoncu'nun köpeklerini üstüne saldığında Falco'nun suratını bir görecektin, ah ulan!"
languages.original_text: "You know very well where." {n}Octaviana waves toward a drab-looking door covered by a sheet of metal.{/n} "The sewers are where that rat belongs. You know, he was going to rat us all out to Chorda. Including Vladaym. You should've seen Falco's face when Vladaym led the Inquisitor's dogs to him first, ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: "Nerede olduğunu pekâlâ biliyorsun." {n}Octaviana; sac levhayla önü kapatılmış, sönük renkli kapıyı işaret ediyor.{/n} "O sıçanın ait olduğu yer lağımdır. Hepimizi Chorda'ya ispiyonloyacaktı, biliyor musun? Vladaym'ı bile. Vladaym evvela Engizisyoncu'nun köpeklerini üstüne saldığında Falco'nun suratını bir görecektin, hahaha!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
